languages.text: {n}Мысли немного путаются, а щеки обжигает хмельной румянец — амасек пьется обманчиво легко, но крепость напитка уже дает о себе знать.{/n}
{n}Your mind is a little hazy, and a drunken flush brightens your cheeks. The amasec may go down deceptively smoothly, but its strength is already making itself known.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мысли немного путаются, а щеки обжигает хмельной румянец — амасек пьется обманчиво легко, но крепость напитка уже дает о себе знать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your mind is a little hazy, and a drunken flush is scalding your cheeks. The amasec may go down deceptively smoothly, but its strength is already making itself known.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的意识有些模糊，酒醉后的红晕让你的脸颊光彩照人。或许这艾玛赛克酒确实非常美味，但它的后劲已经开始上来了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a little hazy, and a drunken flush brightens your cheeks. The amasec may go down deceptively smoothly, but its strength is already making itself known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的意识有些模糊，酒醉后的红晕让你的脸颊光彩照人。或许这艾玛赛克酒确实非常美味，但它的后劲已经开始上来了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}意識が少しぼんやりして、酔いが頬を赤く染めた。アマセックは驚くほど滑らかに喉を通るが、その強さはすでに体に現れ始めていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a little hazy, and a drunken flush brightens your cheeks. The amasec may go down deceptively smoothly, but its strength is already making itself known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}意識が少しぼんやりして、酔いが頬を赤く染めた。アマセックは驚くほど滑らかに喉を通るが、その強さはすでに体に現れ始めていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La bebida se te sube a la cabeza y te ruboriza las mejillas. El amasec entra engañosamente bien, pero sus efectos no tardan en hacerse notar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a little hazy, and a drunken flush brightens your cheeks. The amasec may go down deceptively smoothly, but its strength is already making itself known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La bebida se te sube a la cabeza y te ruboriza las mejillas. El amasec entra engañosamente bien, pero sus efectos no tardan en hacerse notar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zihnin bulanıyor, sarhoşluk kırmızılığı da yanaklarını aydınlatıyor. Amasek, aldatıcı bir şekilde kolay içiliyor olabilir ama ne kadar güçlü olduğu şimdiden belli oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a little hazy, and a drunken flush brightens your cheeks. The amasec may go down deceptively smoothly, but its strength is already making itself known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zihnin bulanıyor, sarhoşluk kırmızılığı da yanaklarını aydınlatıyor. Amasek, aldatıcı bir şekilde kolay içiliyor olabilir ama ne kadar güçlü olduğu şimdiden belli oluyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre esprit est quelque peu embrumé, et une rougeur d'ivresse vous monte aux joues. L'amasec est une boisson trompeuse. Il se boit peut-être facilement, mais ses effets commencent déjà à se faire sentir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a little hazy, and a drunken flush brightens your cheeks. The amasec may go down deceptively smoothly, but its strength is already making itself known.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre esprit est quelque peu embrumé, et une rougeur d'ivresse vous monte aux joues. L'amasec est une boisson trompeuse. Il se boit peut-être facilement, mais ses effets commencent déjà à se faire sentir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Verstand ist leicht benebelt und der Alkohol lässt deine Wangen erröten. Der starke Amasec ist zwar trügerisch süffig, macht sich aber schon jetzt bemerkbar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind is a little hazy, and a drunken flush brightens your cheeks. The amasec may go down deceptively smoothly, but its strength is already making itself known.{/n}
